title: Grand Opening: Desert Pushkar Escape with All-Inclusive Dining, Evening Safari & Cooking Class
description:
A rustic edifice nestled amidst a private farm and the picturesque landscape of Pushkar, MayaGarh by Maya Luxury is synonymous with culture and opulence. The newly-opened hotel is a scenic one-hour drive from the city of Ajmer and around a seven-hour drive from Delhi. Expect endless views of the plains of Nag Pahar, majestic dunes, private pools, top-notch hospitality, lip-smacking delicacies, quaint architecture, and old-world charm.

The gorgeous villas offer scenic views of the desert or the private field within the resort, while the sparkling pool overlooks the lush greenery of the farmland. There are a plethora of experiences you can enjoy while staying at MayaGarh by Maya Luxury, ranging from horse rides, camel rides, and folk entertainment (charges may apply). If a peaceful desert stay is what you wish for, then this is the place for you.
